attributes.action: prevent further ethnic cleansing in Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A welsh family have had all of their assets stripped and the family etnically cleansed by the British Government in full support of the Welsh Assembly and it's political masters in London,all the family wanted was to live a peaceful life, instead their assets were stripped and their lives destroyed, an apology for this ethnic cleansing in this Country is all this family ask for.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
